HEAD_1: Discover millions of subtitles with subtitlex.xyz!
DESCRIPTION_1: Search, download, and enjoy using our extensive library with a massive amount of over 150,000 subtitles for more than 30,000 Videos collected and created when building the Subtitlex.xyz
DESCRIPTION_2: Subtitlex.xyz is a comprehensive database of subtitles for online videos, curated from the internet and produced with fast-whisper. Our mission is to democratize access to high-quality subtitles, fostering community around sharing, learning, and enjoying the video content. Join us in our mission to make intelligent subtitles!
